name: amigurumi heart
notes:
meet this adorable heart - instant download

this sweet amigurumi heart is simply adorable.  quick and fun to make, this heart is perfect for tucking into your decor or to make as a gift to say 'i love you' to someone special!

note: this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own sweet stuffed heart.

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog [here][1]. the
> benefit of purchasing this pdf is an
> easy to read, printable, and ad-free
> version of the pattern.

materials needed:

* super bulky weight yarn
* crochet hook size j 10/6.0 mm 
* fiberfill
* tapestry needle

yarn weight and gauge does not need to be exact, just adjust hook size for your chosen yarn. heart shown is approximately 5" tall by 5" wide.

pattern will be available for instant download upon payment.

the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too. this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal, non-commercial use only. you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances.

due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase.
